N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7406.6 - Review and assessment of reportable incidents

State Regulations
(a) OCFS shall develop and implement
procedures for the review, investigation, and assessment of reportable
incidents. (b) OCFS shall regularly
review all reports prepared by secure facility staff in conjunction with the
review and/or investigation of reportable incidents, including pertinent
facility log entries. (c) The
facility director or person acting in that capacity shall take appropriate
actions, based upon review of prior incidents, to reduce the possibility of
recurrence. Notes
